description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Grab your friends and duel it out in three action-packed mini-games! Test your reactions in 'Wastefall'. Put your memory to the test in 'Carnundrum' and hone your button bashing skills in 'Poodamonium'!
description.short: Grab your friends and duel it out in three action-packed mini-games! Test your reactions in 'Wastefall'. Put your memory to the test in 'Carnundrum' and hone your button bashing skills in 'Poodamonium'!
